whatAmIDoing: I build things for the Web.
Informations: I am a software engineer specialized in building Web Apps and Applications (Exept designing them) and I try to get the Web to another level. Currently im focused on building Web Apps that help others.
textforabout:
I am 13 years old boy and my hobbies are coding, playing table tennis and reading. I am going to high school in germany. I started coding at the age of 9. I started coding discord Bots with python and I defenitly were one of the  most popular discord bot developers back then. At the Age of 11 I started coding websites. I started with small projects and made bigger and bigger. It is my destination to create websites, whcih help people and I am still working on Websites like that. At the age of 12 I learned C#, JavaScript, Node.js, HTML, CSS, SCSS and more. I also learned how to create web applications with Angular, React.js and Next.js. 
 
 Now I am working on a lot of prjects that can help students and new developers I like to create Web Applications that everyone can use to automate things and find out things faster.
